title: Episode 49 w/ Gillie Da Kid & Shaggy
itunes:title: Episode 49 w/ Gillie Da Kid & Shaggy
description:
N.O.R.E. and DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. In this episode the guys drink it up with Philly's own Gillie Da Kid and reggae hit maker Shaggy. The guys talk about Philly rap politics, Shaggy's career, Jamaica and a lot more... --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/drinkchamps/support

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
